creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Taira no Kanemori\'s poem:
Although I\'ve been hiding my feeling 
My hidden love
Must have been reveled somhow
As people start asking me
Why I look so concerned
(Shinobu re do
Iro ni de ni keri
Waga koi wa
Mono ya omou to
Hito no tou made)
and the story related to the poem
medium: From a woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Warriors and One Hundred Poems by the One Hundred Poets (Buke hyakunin isshu)
title: Taira no Kanemori's Poem
